author: B R
title: Striving for perfection -- and great burgers
text:
I used to stay at Hotel Chandler often on business and now don't come to NYC as often. This stay, I reported the fridge was broken. That night, I hadn't been fixed. When I reported it again, the hotel manager comped my meal at the bar the previous night (THANK YOU!!!). This hotel still has turn down service in the evening and they bring chocolates--nice touch. Everything clean and really comfy beds. Waterfall walk-in showers are great. Nice little gym. The doorman has been here forever and is really sweet. What I like best is that they try SO hard to make everything perfect. I've tried lots of NYC hotels. They've never tried to charge me for minibar stuff I didn't take (like another nearby hotel did ALL the time -- which is why I moved here). Love this place. Thank you Hotel Chandler staff.
